import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {useAppDispatch, useAppSelector} from "../../hooks/redux"; import {fetch_all_users} from "../../redux/action_creators/users_action_creator"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const CabinetUsers = () => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch() const {users, isLoading, errors} = useAppSelector(state => state.UsersReducer.allUsers) useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetch_all_users()) }, [ ]) return (
{users.map(item => ( ))}
Nickname Name Surname Email Adress Role Permissions Control
{item.username} {item.name} {item.surname} {item.email} {item.adress} {item.role} {item.permissions.join(" ")} EDIT
); }; export default CabinetUsers;
